com.example.painintheass.UI.widgets

Class Widget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.UI.widgets.Widget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Label

    public abstract class Widget
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Widget. A Widget is the basic element of the UI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Widget

        public Widget(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height)
        Creates a Widget.
        Parameters:
        x - Position on the x axis
        y - Position on the y axis
        width - Width of the widget
        height - height of the widget

      • Widget

        public Widget(int x,
              int y,
              int width,
              int height,
              int backgroundImage,
              int highlighted,
              int grayed,
              int click)
        Creates a Widget.
        Parameters:
        x - Position on the x axis
        y - Position on the y axis
        width - Width of the Widget
        height - Height of the Widget
        backgroundImage - Index of the background bitmap
        highlighted - Index of the highlighted bitmap
        grayed - Index of the grayed bitmap
        click - Index of the clicked bitmap
